issue.title: www.dexerto.com

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.dexerto.com/youtube/youtuber-accidentally-crashes-the-rare-plant-market-with-a-viral-cloning-technique-3289808/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dexerto.com%2Fyoutube%2Fyoutuber-accidentally-crashes-the-rare-plant-market-with-a-viral-cloning-technique-3289808%2F) ### Comment > opening the site flashes an image of a Pokemon team rocket member and then goes to the site that shows it cannot load. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/rqgx04g8wkgkggc44gc8c4oow0s04gcp1slii3gyy8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/m0fxssb45pss4g0go0cwc04wkog0wk02c83r09w71e.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.18.0.2082 nightly Browser: | Safari Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled Userstyles: | disabled ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=mac&product_version=2.18.0.2082+nightly&system_version=&browser=safari&filters=2&dns.filters_enabled=false&dns.enabled=false&browsing_security.enabled=false&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.dexerto.com/pokemon/pokemon-go-research-breakthrough-tasks-1545588/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dexerto.com%2Fpokemon%2Fpokemon-go-research-breakthrough-tasks-1545588%2F) ### Comment > AdGuard is recognized by the website. It loads briefly, then goes to a message saying to allow ads. Even when protection mode is set to off for that site, it gives the same message. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/cbsbfb33v400ckkksg04kw8cgw0o4wgpsia3u2bizk.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/oiftpppk0w00owssokgsk4os44g48o8efgzfj8cjg0.png?nc=1)

AdGuard Base

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Annoyances:
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets

Security:
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
Phishing URL Blocklist,
Dandelion Sprout's Anti-Malware List

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion Filters last update: | January 07, 2026 at 09:00 Other extensions used: | `Session Buddy, LastPass, Save To Pocket` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=ext&product_version=5.2.800.18&system_version=Windows+11&manifest_version=3&browser=chrome&filters=2.4.10.18.19.20.21.22.208.255.259&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&filters_last_update=2026-01-07T09%3A00%3A41)
